resources.string: January is first month of the year
February is second month of the year
March is third month of the year
April is fourth month of the year
May is fifth month of the year
June is sixth month of the year
July is seventh month of the year
August is eighth month of the year
September is ninth month of the year
October is tenth month of the year
November is eleventh month of the year
December is twelfth month of the year
